description: Unique ID for the tournament, e.g. WC-2018.
notes: Used to join matches to tournaments and to identify the World Cup edition.

description: Full name of the tournament.
notes: Used only for readability; not required for modeling.

description: Calendar year of the tournament.
notes: Used to define train (1930–2018) vs test (2022).

description: Unique ID for the match within a tournament and year.
notes: Key identifier for a match.

description: Human-readable label for the match.
notes: Convenience label; often not used directly in modeling.

description: Date of the match (YYYY-MM-DD).
notes: Parsed to datetime in cleaning script.

description: Name of the stage of the tournament.
notes: Can be one-hot encoded or grouped for modeling.

description: Indicator for whether the match is in a group stage.
notes: Converted to 0/1 integer in cleaning script.

description: Indicator for whether the match is in a knockout stage.
notes: Converted to 0/1 integer in cleaning script.

description: Name of the home team.
notes: Text label; can be mapped to codes or IDs.

description: Three-letter code for the home team.
notes: Useful categorical identifier for teams.

description: Name of the away team.
notes: Text label; can be mapped to codes or IDs.

description: Three-letter code for the away team.
notes: Useful categorical identifier for teams.

description: Goals scored by the home team in normal+extra time.
notes: Numeric; used to derive outcome variables.

description: Goals scored by the away team in normal+extra time.
notes: Numeric; used to derive outcome variables.

description: Goal difference from the home team perspective.
notes: Should equal home_team_score - away_team_score.

description: Goal difference from the away team perspective.
notes: Should equal away_team_score - home_team_score.

description: Indicator for whether the match went to extra time.
notes: Converted to 0/1 integer in cleaning script.

description: Indicator for whether the match ended with a penalty shootout.
notes: Converted to 0/1 integer in cleaning script.

description: Final shootout score in penalties (if any).
notes: May be empty/NA for matches without shootouts.

description: Number of penalties converted by the home team (if shootout).
notes: NA/0 if no shootout.

description: Number of penalties converted by the away team (if shootout).
notes: NA/0 if no shootout.

description: Outcome category from the dataset.
example_values: home team win; away team win; draw; replayed
notes: Should be consistent with scores and win/draw indicators.

description: Indicator for whether the home team won.
notes: Converted to 0/1 integer in cleaning script.

description: Indicator for whether the away team won.
notes: Converted to 0/1 integer in cleaning script.

description: Indicator for whether the match ended in a draw after regulation (and extra time, if played).
notes: Converted to 0/1 integer in cleaning script.
